name: DunkerFIGHTS
description:
DunkerFIGHTS is fun and little frustrating TWO Player game.

It is a casual basketball game. You play as dunker with mustachio and fight with other one. You got 120 seconds. Dunk as many as possible and show who is the boss! 

DunkerFIGHTS is designed, drawn and programmed by one guy, me :) , for BYOG 2018

Theme used: Sports

Two player - play on a same machine with arrow keys and WASD.

Plans:

- Multiplayer gameplay on separate devices

- Mobile version

- Vs AI mode / single player mode

Keep Dunking :)
